job.title: React/React Native Engineer
job.description: <p>Role: React/React Native Engineer</p><p>Location: Remote - USA&nbsp;</p><p>Type: Fulltime</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Job Description</strong></p><p>We are looking for a React/React Native Engineer with strong problem-solving skills. This position will play a key role in the continued development of our products, which have real-life impacts on tens of thousands of people per year.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Requirements:</strong></p><ul><li>Excellent communication skills</li><li>A deep understanding of React</li><li>Deep experience with React Native</li><li>Experience with REST APIs</li><li>Experience with version control, preferably Git</li><li>Constantly strive to expand knowledge and stay current with new engineering tools</li></ul><p><strong>&nbsp;</strong></p><p><strong>Nice to Have/Want to Learn:</strong></p><ul><li>Native Mobile Application Development experience</li><li>Fastlane or other CI/CD Experience</li><li>Automated testing experience</li></ul><p><br></p><p><em>If you are interested, please share a good time and your number for a short discussion. Alternatively, you could share your updated resume&nbsp;at </em><strong>anosh.kumar@bayonesolutions.com</strong><em>&nbsp;or call me at&nbsp;</em><strong>(925) 218-2347</strong><em>. Looking forward to hearing from you!</em></p>
